clothing_items.details: Classic biker jacket silhouette with an oversized fit. Features a wide notched lapel, asymmetrical zip-front closure, and multiple zippered pockets at the chest and waist. The jacket has a belted waist and snap-down epaulettes. The lining is black satin. The leather has a slightly worn-in appearance.
Fitted corset top with a ribbed knit texture. Features a sweetheart neckline and boning for structure. The top has a hook-and-eye closure at the back. The straps are adjustable.
Classic straight-leg jeans with a high-waisted fit. Features a five-pocket construction with copper rivets. The jeans have a zip fly and button closure. The denim has a slightly faded appearance.
Fingerless gloves with exposed knuckles and a snap closure at the wrist.

aesthetic: edgy, utilitarian, and rebellious with a focus on comfort and functionality
